BENT

2018 Image from National Theater Festival

Founded in 2010, ETS Theater Company has developed and produced over 12 plays in New York, Berkshire, and Korea. Our mission is to produce ambitious plays to inspire empathy and provoke conversation that will lead to positive social change. We have produced the new and prominant plays. We produce theater to inspire empathy and provoke conversations in response to the complexities of today's world.
